name: part_001
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕LIVE2023】3rd Generation Girls Band !!!!【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [AqEqeiqskEI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Houshou Marine and Shirogane Noel perform a high-energy punk rock cover of 'Matsuri' in a classroom setting.
Marine and Noel are exhausted after their performance and lament the lack of an audience.
Usada Pekora and Shiranui Flare approach Marine and Noel, impressed by their performance. Marine and Noel invite them to join the band.
Narration describes the passing of time and the band's rigorous practice leading up to the culture festival.
The newly formed band, 3rd Generation, performs 'Fuwa Fuwa Time' at the school culture festival.
